chunk_text:
Product Support Subscription Videos

I mentioned the Revit 2010 Subscription Pack last week, and Matt Mason highlighted the model review add-in included with it and its little API, which is just one example of all the good stuff in there. Autodesk Product Support has now published a series ofÂ  'deeper dive' subscription pack videos which cover the subscription pack features and functionality and provide you with a deeper understanding of their use as well as anticipating and answering potential questions.
